error.signature: future cannot be sent between threads safely because `Rc<T>` does not implement `Send`
error.regex: future cannot be sent between threads safely.*does not implement.*Send

verdict.summary: Async runtimes like tokio require futures to be Send. Non-Send types (Rc, Cell) held across await points cause this error.

dead_ends.action: Wrap non-Send type in unsafe impl Send
dead_ends.why_fails: Data races will occur because the type is intentionally not Send for safety

dead_ends.action: Use tokio::task::spawn_blocking to bypass Send requirement
dead_ends.why_fails: spawn_blocking still requires Send for the closure; only the inner code can be non-async

workarounds.action: Replace Rc with Arc and RefCell with Mutex/RwLock

leads_to.condition: When more Send bounds surface after initial fix

preceded_by.condition: When runtime issues lead to refactoring async code

frequently_confused_with.distinction: E0277 Send is the generic trait bound error; this specifically refers to futures held across await points
